title: Greek fried chicken
ingredients: ['4 skinless chicken pieces', '125ml Greek olive oil', '1 lemon, juiced', '1 1/2 tablespoons freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 1/2 tablespoons dried oregano', '1 dash cinnamon', '1 dash poultry seasoning', '125ml olive oil for frying', '1 lemon, cut into wedges']
